// rollup.config.js
import { fileURLToPath } from "node:url";

export default {
    //...,
    external: [
        "some-externally-required-library",
        fileURLToPath(
            new URL(
                "src/some-local-file-that-should-not-be-bundled.js",
                import.meta.url
            )
        ),
        /node_modules/,
    ],
};
